content.rendered:
MapUs Case collection

MapUs is used in all kinds of organizations across all sectors to create empowering digital transformation. Look through our case collection to get inspiration on how you can use MapUs to take your organizations digital profile to the next level. 

Cases on Management

Making digital leadership accessible and empowering for municipal managers
See how Albertslund and Glostrup municipalities used MapUs to create a concrete and accessible persona of digital management which strengthened the digital competence levels of their managers.
Read the case
Kickstarting a digital strategy in style
Holstebro municipality launched a new digital strategy with a specific focus on the role of managers to propel the digital development. At the kickoff event, MapUs was used to facilitate a shared language and a common digital mindset for the work ahead.
Read the case

Cases on HR

Anchoring an organization wide digital mindset
The HR department at Region Midtjylland were looking for a tangible tool to kickstart the work with digital competencies as they had identified a gap in the employees’ digital mindset. Some employees assumed that digitization only concerned the IT department, and MapUs helped them change that.
Read the case
Targeted competence development for health staff
MapUs is a great tool for supporting upskilling efforts, and measuring their effect. That is exactly what Horsens municipality used MapUs for. With a customized competence model amied at health staff, they elevated their Technology Agent Training program (TAU) and helped the participants see how digital solutions supported their tasks.
Read the case

Cases on Education

Enhancement of Digital Competence for Educators
UCL University College came to us looking for a tool that could help them work strategically with the digital competence levels of their educators. Together, we developed a MapUs framework that allowed them to do just that. What followed was a transformation that birthed and rooted a digital mindset throughout the organization.  
Read the case
Educating the digital citizens of tomorrow
Technische Hochschule Nürnberg Georg-Simon-Ohm recognized that continuous (self-)education and digital competences are important factors for employment, personal development and participation in a digital society. With MapUs as the backbone, they created a full curriculum for their students on digital competence.
Read the case

Cases on Consultancy

Enabling versatile digital consultancy and service
Komponent were looking for accessible tool to elevate their consultancy on digitalization to Danish municipalities. In order to make their services relevant to the entire municipal organization, it had to be versatile and customizable, and this is why they choose MapUs. It enabled them to map employees, hold workshops and kickstart a digital dialogue.
Read the case

Cases on Public administration and service

Empowering the next generation to use public digital services
The Agency for Digitization came to us, as they were struggling to create awareness amongst 15-18 year olds about the importance of being able to navigate public digital solutions. In a collaborative effort, we developed a MapUs framework, which proved to be just the tool they'd been missing. 
Read the case

Cases on Digitalization

Sparking A Nation Wide Conversation about Digital Competencies
The Store and Office Workers' Union in Iceland, VR, saw that their members and the public in general struggled to understand and embrace the impact of societal digitalization. They took it upon themselves to kickstart the conversation about digital development in Iceland through their members - and MapUs helped them succeed.
Read the case
